models.create_model_info: Create one of face recognition services: Face Recognition, Face Detection or Face Verification.
models.info_about_service: Services provide you with different face recognition functionality. Each service has an API key you need to make requests. Please choose service type according to your business needs.

delete_dialog.title: Model Delete
delete_dialog.warn_information: and all related data will be deleted.
delete_dialog.confirmation_question: Are you sure you want to delete {{ entityType }}? This action can not be undone. Type the {{ entityType }} name to confirm.

confirmation_dialog.delete_confirmation_question: Are you sure you want to delete this user? This action can not be undone.
confirmation_dialog.warning_msg_owner: The user {{ user }} is OWNER of applications: {{ applicationNames }}. You can delete him anyway. In this case you will become the OWNER of these applications.
confirmation_dialog.warning_msg_admin: The user {{ user }} is OWNER of applications: {{ applicationNames }}. You can delete him anyway. In this case, the OWNER of the application will be the global OWNER.

manage.role_update_description: Are you sure you want to reassign OWNER role to another user ?
manage.warning_txt: All registered CompreFace users except the first one won't see any applications. To give them access you need to add them to individual application. Global Owner and Global Administrators have full access to all applications.

confirm_dialog.title: Stop Uploading
confirm_dialog.confirmation_question: You have loading images in the background. If you leave this page, the load will be canceled. Do you really want to leave the page?

delete_dialog.title: {{type}} Delete
delete_dialog.confirmation_question: Are you sure you want to delete {{name}} {{lastName}} from your project?
delete_dialog.warn_information: The user {{firstName}} {{lastName}} is OWNER of applications:
delete_dialog.warn_hint_owner: In this case you will become the OWNER of these applications.
delete_dialog.warn_hint_new_owner: In this case the owner of this applications will be:
delete_dialog.warn_hint_replace_to_owner: In this case, the OWNER of the application will be the global OWNER
delete_dialog.default_confirmation:
{{type}} {{name}} and all related data will be deleted.
Are you sure?

org_users.add_users_info: You are now the only CompreFace user. Once other users sign up, they will appear in this list. You, as an owner, will be able to give them rights to manage system or individual applications.
org_users.edit_user_info: User info has been successfully updated

app_users.add_users_info: All registered CompreFace users except the first one won't see any applications. To give them access you need to add them to individual application. Global Owner and Global Administrators have full access to all applications.

delete_dialog.title: User Delete
delete_dialog.confirmation_question: Are you sure you want to remove user {{name}} from {{application}}?

application.title: Create your application
application.info_about_application: Application is where you can create and manage your face recognition services. It allows restricting their visibility from other users
application.application_name_question: What would you like to name this application ?

service.title: Add a service
service.info_about_service: Services provide you with different face recognition functionality. Each service has an API key you need to make requests. Please choose service type according to your business needs.
service.service_name_question: What would you like to name this service ?
service.service_type: What kind of service is it?
service.recognition_type: Face recognition service is used for face identification. You first need to upload known faces to the faces collection and then recognize unknown faces among them.
service.detection_type: Face detection service is used to detect all faces in the image. It doesnâ€™t recognize faces, just finds them on the image.
service.verification_type: Face verification service is used to check if this person is the correct one. The service compares two faces you send to the rest endpoint and returns their similarity.
